articles.description: A meeting between Cricket Australia and the players union on Friday is set to be postponed.

articles.title: 'That's bulls**t': Sam Newman scorched for unbelievable virus claim - Yahoo News Australia
articles.description: Sam Newman has stunned his co-hosts after claiming he knows more about coronavirus than medical experts.

articles.title: Kyrgios not on board with Federer's vision of merged tennis tour - Sydney Morning Herald
articles.description: Roger Federer has been supported in his desire to merge the ATP and WTA Tours but not everyone is fully convinced, including Australia's Nick Kyrgios.
